Full of intrigue and contrivance, The Secret Garden brings a classic spy hero to life who must face the ultimate challenge- to avert a nuclear war and rely solely on his survival skills to cope with his mission. Peter must act fast to stop the terrorists before they are able to carry out their devious plan. Will Peter win out in the end? Or will the terrorists get the upper hand?
